    def update_history_display(self):

    progress_updated = pyqtSignal(str)  # è¿›åº¦æ›´æ–°

- Removed the unused GLM ChatParameterPanel UI and associated PyQt imports; chat components now jump from ChatInput directly to ChatHistory (components/chat_components.py:9, components/chat_components.py:174).
- Cleared leftover ZHIPU placeholders from settings initialization (components/settings_page.py:82-110).
- Documented GLM removal in the environment template and disabled the sample key ( .env.example:14-15).
- Pruned ZHIPU sample/config branches; get_api_key now only serves Volcengine/Ark lookups (config_api_example.py:155-184).
- Dropped GLM metadata from module registry (modules/__init__.py:2, modules/__init__.py:18-36) and marked chat records as unknown source instead of glm (modules/repository/csv_handler.py:194-214).
- Reference/usage checks done via ripgrep; no runtime imports of the removed GLM UI or MODULE_INFO entries found.

Report: docs/refactor/phases/phase1_glm_cleanup/stage1_execution_report.md:1 (timestamp 2025-11-18 18:55, 6 files touched, ~265 lines removed, 2 comment lines added).

Tests: not run (scope limited to code/data cleanup).  
Next: run the app and config load sanity check as noted in the report.
